headline: GTA Online
subtitle: The Freemode Events Update is Now Available
content:
An entirely new way to play GTA Online featuring a wide array of madness, including: Hunt the Beast, Penned In, and many more. All playable in an open Freemode session with no loading screens or lobbies.

Events can kick off at any given moment while in Freemode, and you can customize your session to decide exactly which ones will happen â€“ so you can play as much or as little of this new content as you like.

Also included are two new exciting Adversary Modes: Cross the Line and Hunting Pack.
